#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code

  Log_info("Put Called...! "); 

  switch (GetRaftServer().current_state_)
  {
    case 0:
    case 1: Log_info("Shard Master returns KVNotLeader..!");
            return KV_NOTLEADER;
            break;

    case 2:
    
    string x=std::to_string(oid);
    Log_info("We in PUT LEADER Shard KVServer for OPID : %d ----> <---- Server : %d", oid, GetRaftServer().site_id_);

    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);


    s->data_.push_back(v);

    auto sp_m = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

    auto op_data = std::make_shared<ShardKVOpData>(ShardKVOpData{KV_TIMEOUT});
    op_success.insert(std::make_pair(to_string(oid), op_data));

    uint64_t index, term;
    index = GetRaftServer().logs_.size();
    term = GetRaftServer().current_term_;  

    Log_info("Submit to RAFT..%d %d State : %d  CMD : %s", index, term, GetRaftServer().current_state_, x);


    bool isLeader = GetRaftServer().Start(sp_m, &index, &term);
    Log_info("We complete Start %d", isLeader);

    if(isLeader == false){
      Log_info("We in Not leader for %d ", GetRaftServer().site_id_);
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    
    op_data->cmit_evt.value_ = 0;
    Log_info("PUT Event Value Set to -> %d", op_data->cmit_evt.value_);
    op_data->cmit_evt.WaitUntilGreaterOrEqualThan(1, 500000);

    Log_info("Status Return from Put OPID : %s Return :%d", std::to_string(oid).c_str(), op_data->status);

    return op_data->status;
  }

  return KV_TIMEOUT;

/*     kv_store_[k] = v;
    return KV_SUCCESS; */
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code

  Log_info("Append Called...! ");

  switch (GetRaftServer().current_state_)
  {
    case 0:
    case 1: Log_info("Shard Master returns KVNotLeader..!");
            return KV_NOTLEADER;
            break;

    case 2:

    string x=std::to_string(oid);    
    Log_info("We in APPEND LEADER Shard KVServer for OPID : %d ----> <---- Server : %d", oid, GetRaftServer().site_id_);

    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);


    s->data_.push_back(v);

    auto sp_m = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

    auto op_data = std::make_shared<ShardKVOpData>(ShardKVOpData{KV_TIMEOUT});
    op_success.insert(std::make_pair(to_string(oid), op_data));

    uint64_t index, term;
    index = GetRaftServer().logs_.size();
    term = GetRaftServer().current_term_;

    Log_info("Submit to RAFT..%d %d State : %d  CMD : %s!", index, term, GetRaftServer().current_state_, x.c_str());
    bool isLeader = GetRaftServer().Start(sp_m, &index, &term);
    Log_info("We complete Start %d", isLeader);

    if(isLeader == false){
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    op_data->cmit_evt.WaitUntilGreaterOrEqualThan(1, 500000);

    Log_info("Return from Append Status : %d", op_data->status);

    return op_data->status;
  }

/*     if(kv_store_.count(k) > 0){
      kv_store_[k] += v;  
    } else {
      kv_store_[k] = v;
    } */
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code

  Log_info("Get Called...! ");

  switch (GetRaftServer().current_state_)
  {
    case 0:
    case 1: Log_info("Not Leader..!");
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
    break;

    case 2:
    
    string x=std::to_string(oid);
    Log_info("We in GET LEADER ShardKV Server ----> <---- Op ID : %s Key : %s and Server : %d", x.c_str(), k.c_str(), GetRaftServer().site_id_);

    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);

    auto sp_m = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

    auto op_data = std::make_shared<ShardKVOpData>(ShardKVOpData{KV_TIMEOUT});
    op_success.insert(std::make_pair(to_string(oid), op_data));

    uint64_t index, term;
    index = GetRaftServer().logs_.size();
    term = GetRaftServer().current_term_;  

    Log_info("Submit to RAFT..%d %d State : %d  CMD : %s!", index, term, GetRaftServer().current_state_);
    bool isLeader = GetRaftServer().Start(sp_m, &index, &term);
    Log_info("We complete Start %d", isLeader);

    if(isLeader == false){
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    Log_info("Coroutine WAIT START!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!");
    
    op_data->cmit_evt.WaitUntilGreaterOrEqualThan(1, 500000);

    Log_info("Coroutine WAIT DONEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!");
    Log_info("Return from GET Status : %d", op_data->status);
    
    if(op_data->status == KV_SUCCESS){
      *v = kv_store_.at(k);
      Log_info("Value from GET for Key %d : %d", k, *v);
    }

    return op_data->status;
  }  
  
//  *v = kv_store_[k];
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code

  Coroutine::CreateRun([&m, this](){ 
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */


  Log_info("We in OnNextCommand Shard KV Server ----> <---- CMD : %s for Server State : %d and OPD : %s Key : %s", v->data_.at(1).c_str(),sp_log_svr_->site_id_, v->data_.at(0).c_str(), v->data_.at(2).c_str());

  if(v->data_.at(1) == "put"){
    Log_info("We in OnNextCommand PUT Shard KV Server ----> <---- for Server State : %d and OPD : %s Key : %s Value : %s", sp_log_svr_->site_id_, v->data_.at(0).c_str(), v->data_.at(2).c_str(), v->data_.at(3).c_str());
    Log_info("KV STORE SIZE : %d ", kv_store_.size());
    kv_store_[v->data_.at(2)] = v->data_.at(3);
    Log_info("AFTER KV STORE SIZE : %d ", kv_store_.size());
  } 
  else if(v->data_.at(1) == "append"){
    auto it = kv_store_.find(v->data_.at(2));
    if (it != kv_store_.end()) {
        kv_store_[v->data_.at(2)] = kv_store_[v->data_.at(2)] + v->data_.at(3);
    } else {
        kv_store_[v->data_.at(2)] = v->data_.at(3);
    }
  } 



  if(GetRaftServer().current_state_ == 2 && op_success.find(v->data_.at(0)) != op_success.end()){
    Log_info("OnNextCommand Event OPD: %s Value is : %d and status : %d", v->data_.at(0).c_str(), op_success.at(v->data_.at(0))->cmit_evt.value_, op_success.at(v->data_.at(0))->status);
    op_success.at(v->data_.at(0))->status = KV_SUCCESS;
    op_success.at(v->data_.at(0))->cmit_evt.Set(1);  
    Log_info("OnNextCommand Set's Event OPD : %s Value to : %d and status : %d", v->data_.at(0).c_str(), op_success.at(v->data_.at(0))->cmit_evt.value_, op_success.at(v->data_.at(0))->status);
  }
  
  });
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
